getResendTimeout

public long getResendTimeout()
Specified by:
getResendTimeout in class CertifiedMessage
Returns:
The amount of time to wait in milliseconds for a certification response before resending this message.

getMaxTries

public int getMaxTries()
Specified by:
getMaxTries in class CertifiedMessage
Returns:
The number of attempts to make to send this message before discarding it. A value of 0 will keep attempting until successful.
